overview: The Queens of the Road are back! Janet Mason and Syd Blakovich can’t keep their hands (and feet) off each other. There’s some great toe sucking and toe fucking here. Things progress to the point where Syd dons a strap on and has some fun with Janet. Chastity Lynn and Veronica Avluv start things off with some kissing, but then the scene heats up faster than you can count to 69. Deauxma and Kara Price love to run their tongues all over each other. And Janet Mason is back for the final scene, this time with Shyla Jennings.
tagline: She's looking for a few good women!
title: Road Queen 21
